# Account data source

Learn about the account data source

Use the Account data source to export customer Accounts with Contacts and Payment Methods .

## Objects available in the data source

![Account_Data_Source.jpg](https://zuora.deploy.heretto.com/v4/deployments/QPAZk6lsgXwvotedNERE/object/36e5a7d8-7515-4351-9335-9048ce7db28d?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..qj6Q7t3DMX_7DSgOr6ZanhkR_-1CPN1xvLULiljyFT0)

For more information, refer to these topics:

-   [Base object description](/zuora-platform/data/reporting/data-sources-and-exports/data-source-reference/account-data-source/base-object-description)

-   [Related Zuora objects](/zuora-platform/data/reporting/data-sources-and-exports/data-source-reference/account-data-source/related-zuora-objects)


## The CMRR field

There are account-level CMRR and subscription-level CMRR with different calculation logic. See Contracted MRR for more information.
